resources.string: This allows Pebble Messenger to forward notifications to your pebble!
Finished loading font database! Tap to dismiss₀
There is a message coming, but the font database is not ready. Please wait a while! If the error take long times, please rebuild the font data base at the setting view in Pebble Messenger.
The Message is no more kept in Pebble Messenger. Please check it by phone.
Sorry! I am busy and call you later.
Sorry! I am in a meeting, Send me message or waiting for my call back later.
